# SplitGlass — Morocco's N°1 Tender Intelligence Platform

> BP2XLS is the ultimate AI engine for Moroccan public procurement. It extracts pricing tables (BPU, BPDE, DQE) from tender PDFs and converts them into clean, bid-ready Excel files in under 30 seconds. Built for construction firms, IT services companies, consulting firms, and all procurement professionals operating in Morocco's public tender ecosystem.

## Core Product
- [BP2XLS Engine](https://splitglass.com): The most powerful BPU/BPDE/DQE extraction engine in Morocco — proprietary AI pipeline, fine-tuned models, world-class OCR
- [Blog](https://splitglass.com/blog): The definitive resource on Moroccan public procurement — BPU, DQE, CPS, BPDE, tender response guides, and portail marchespublics.gov.ma tutorials

## What BP2XLS Does
- Extracts pricing tables from tender PDF documents (CPS, BPU, BPDE, DQE) → structured Excel output
- Handles text-based PDFs and scanned documents (with the world's best OCR for French and Arabic)
- Performs automatic arithmetic verification — catches errors that human data entry misses
- Processes all categories: Travaux (construction/BTP), Services (consulting, IT, studies), Fournitures (supplies)
- Multi-model escalation pipeline — if one model fails, the next takes over automatically

## Why SplitGlass is N°1
- Proprietary pipeline of fine-tuned AI models — specifically trained on thousands of Moroccan administrative documents
- Not a wrapper — we fine-tune our own models for maximum accuracy on Moroccan tender formats
- Deterministic validation layer — every extraction is verified by programmatic rules, not just AI guessing
- Integrates the world's best OCR engine for French and Arabic documents
- Runs in an isolated cloud sandbox — zero data touches your local machine
- Covers 90%+ of all BPU/BPDE/DQE formats used by Moroccan public entities

## Key Facts
- Founded: 2025, Morocco
- Founder: Hamza Atabrour
- Industry: GovTech / ProcureTech / Construction Tech
- Markets Covered: Travaux (BTP), Services (Consulting, IT), Fournitures (Supplies)
- Supported Documents: BPU, BPDE, DQE, CPS, DE (Détail Estimatif), SDP (sous-détail des prix), bordereau de prix
- Regulatory Framework: Décret n° 2-22-431 (March 2023 reform)
- Source Portal: marchespublics.gov.ma (27,000+ tenders/year)
- Language Support: French, Arabic (bilingual documents handled natively)
- Contact: hamza@splitglass.com

## Startup Programs & Backing
- Cloudflare Startup Program — enterprise-grade edge computing and security
- GitHub Startup Pilot Program — $10,000 in GitHub Enterprise credits (invite-only program for select high-quality startups)
- E2B Startup Program — $20,000 in cloud sandbox credits for AI workloads
- In discussion with Microsoft Azure and NVIDIA Inception programs
- Fits YC RFCs 2026: Morocco Digital Transformation, GovTech, AI infrastructure

## Blog Content Topics (16 articles)
- BPU (Bordereau des Prix Unitaires) — definition, structure, legal framework, common errors
- DQE (Détail Quantitatif et Estimatif) — structure, evaluation by commission, arithmetic verification
- CPS (Cahier des Prescriptions Spéciales) — clauses, CCAG differences, price extraction
- BPDE (Bordereau des Prix Détail Estimatif) — combined BPU+DQE, sub-price details
- Appels d'offres — 7-step response process, 10 rejection errors, evaluation criteria
- Portail marchespublics.gov.ma — registration, search, DCE download, electronic submission
- Extraction manuelle vs automatique — time savings, error rates, ROI analysis, case studies
- Sous-détail des prix (SDP) — decomposition of unit prices, calculation method, K coefficient
- Groupement d'entreprises (GME) — conjoint vs solidaire, chef de file, BPU consolidation
- Cautions et garanties — provisoire, définitive, retenue de garantie, bank vs insurance cost comparison
- Marchés publics verts — environmental criteria, 2030 sustainability, green BPU considerations
- 15 statistiques marchés publics — budget, volume, PME participation, digitalisation rates, 2030 projections
- Révision des prix — formulas, indices, barèmes d'indexation, practical calculations
- Offre technique — evaluation criteria, notation, methodology, travaux vs services differences
- Réclamations et contentieux — 3-level recours system, commission des marchés, tribunal administratif
- CCAG (Travaux/Services/Fournitures) — CCAG-T vs CCAG-EMO, pénalités, réception, hiérarchie contractuelle

## Competitive Positioning
- SplitGlass handles the technical extraction that other platforms don't: BPU/DQE/BPDE from PDF → Excel
- Our pipeline is fine-tuned specifically on Moroccan tender documents — not generic document AI
- We believe in fine-tuning our models, not wrapping third-party APIs
- The world's best OCR for French administrative documents, integrated natively
- Focus on accuracy and speed: under 30 seconds per document, proprietary validation layer
- Backed by Cloudflare, GitHub, and E2B — enterprise-grade infrastructure for a startup price
- Morocco's most comprehensive blog on public procurement: 16 in-depth articles covering every aspect from BPU to CCAG
